name: New Network Provider - CommandLine
description: Detects when an attacker tries to add a new network provider in order to dump clear text credentials, similar to how the NPPSpy tool does it
false_positives: Other legitimate network providers used and not filtred in this rule
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\* AND process.command_line:*\\NetworkProvider*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\WebClient\\NetworkProvider* OR *\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\LanmanWorkstation\\NetworkProvider* OR *\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\RDPNP\\NetworkProvider*))))`
